net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.tools

Class HashingIndexor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.tools.Indexor
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.tools.HashingIndexor

  • public class HashingIndexor
extends Indexor
    This class extends Indexor and does hashing (bit sampling) on a given feature. The hashes are stored in a Lucene field named "Hashes".

    Created: 21.03.13 10:03

    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at
